credit_line: Gift of Carleton Varney and Richard Hunnings
title: Design for a Corvair 880 Airplane Lavatory
medium:
Air brushed gouache, brush and gold paint, graphite
on illustration board
description: Design for airplane lavatory with black floor, white walls and bathroom fixtures and red accents on toilet, cabinet, and mirror paneling.  Also gold faucet fixture and paneling on toilet paper and paper towel storage.
name: Drawing
